You hear echoes so clearly that even the reflected sound of your footsteps or the hum of a starshipâ€™s engine can disclose hidden secrets.

Prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.MrtFI7pke9a514YM]{Echolocation Attack} COM, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} 9 ranks

Benefit: You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#blindsense]{blindsense} (sound) with a range of 30 feet. If you already have blindsense (sound or vibration), you instead gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#blindsight]{blindsight} (sound or vibration, matching your blindsense type). When using the Echolocation Attack feat, you extend the range of your granted blindsight by 30 feet.
